column2: Windows revenue increased $254 million or 5% driven by growth in Windows Commercial and
Windows OEM. Windows Commercial products and cloud services revenue increased 8% driven by
demand for Microsoft 365. Windows OEM revenue increased 4%.
Gaming revenue increased $309 million or 9% driven by growth in Xbox content and services.
Xbox content and services revenue increased 13% driven by growth in first-party content and
Xbox Game Pass. Xbox hardware revenue decreased 7% driven by lower volume of consoles sold,
offset in part by higher price of consoles sold.
